07 August 2024 2024-08-07T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2024/08/07/sigirforumaccept.html

Our paper “Unexplored frontiers: A review of empirical studies of exploratory search” was published in SIGIR Forum.

16 July 2024 2024-07-16T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2024/07/16/sigir24.html

Yang presented our paper On the Negative Perception of Cross-domain Recommendations and Explanations at SIGIR 2024.

15 April 2024 2024-04-15T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2024/04/15/sigiraccept.html

Long paper accepted to SIGIR 2024!

11 March 2024 2024-03-11T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2024/03/11/chiir24.html

Denis presented our paper The Dark Matter of Serendipity in Recommender Systems at CHIIR 2024.

01 March 2024 2024-03-01T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2024/03/01/chiaccept.html

Late breaking work paper accepted to CHI 2024!

20 January 2024 2024-01-20T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2024/01/20/chiaccept.html

Long paper (conditionally) accepted to CHI 2024!

20 December 2023 2023-12-20T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2023/12/20/researcheroftheyear.html

Yang received the Researcher of the Year award from the Department of Computer Science. Congratulations!

14 December 2023 2023-12-14T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2023/12/14/iuiaccept.html

Long paper accepted to IUI 2024!

12 December 2023 2023-12-12T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2023/12/12/chiiraccept.html

Long paper accepted to CHIIR 2024!

26 October 2023 2023-10-26T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2023/10/26/peopleflow.html

Business Finland have agreed to fund our project “Untangling People Flow for Smart and Sustainable Urban Environments”. Consortium partners include: University of Helsinki, University of Oulu, University of Lapland, VTT, Kone, Elisa, Finavia, Haltian, Workspace, Granlund and City of Helsinki.

21 September 2023 2023-09-21T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2023/09/21/recsys23.html

Yang presented our papers What We Evaluate When We Evaluate Recommender Systems: Understanding Recommender Systems’ Performance using Item Response Theory and On the Consistency, Discriminative Power and Robustness of Sampled Metrics in Offline Top-n Recommender System Evaluation at RecSys 2023.

21 July 2023 2023-07-21T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2023/07/21/recsysaccept.html

Late breaking results paper accepted to RecSys 2023!

20 June 2023 2023-06-20T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2023/06/20/recsysaccept.html

Long paper accepted to RecSys 2023!

15 May 2023 2023-05-15T00:00:00+03:00 /blog/2023/05/15/maristart.html

Mari Lehtikari has joined the group as a summer trainee!

20 March 2023 2023-03-20T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2023/03/20/chiir23.html

Denis presented our paper Rethinking Serendipity in Recommender Systems at CHIIR 2023.

01 February 2023 2023-02-01T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2023/02/01/ivanstart.html

Ivan Kropotov has joined the group as a software designer!

15 December 2022 2022-12-15T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2022/12/15/grant.html

We have received funding from Business Finland for the R2B project “CoCreation Radar” with colleagues from The Centre for Consumer Research, University of Helsinki.

13 December 2022 2022-12-13T00:00:00+02:00 /blog/2022/12/13/chiiraccept.html

Short paper accepted to CHIIR 2023!

Yang was awarded a NOKIA scholarship. Congratulations!
